greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Sum_{k>=1} phi(k) * x^k/(1 - x^k)^4, where phi = Euler totient function (A000010).
comment: Dirichlet convolution of Euler totient function with tetrahedral numbers.
mathematica: nmax = 47; CoefficientList[Series[Sum[EulerPhi[k] x^k/(1 - x^k)^4, {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] // Rest
Table[Sum[Sum[Sum[GCD[i, j, k, n], {i, 1, j}], {j, 1, k}], {k, 1, n}], {n, 1, 47}]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jul 23 2019
